level.heading: OPTIONAL TAX COMPUTATION FOR D.C. RESIDENTS (ยง 9-112)

level.text: Any resident other than a fiduciary, may elect to compute the tax due in accordance with the Optional Tax Table(s) if taxable income is less than fifty thousand dollars ($ 50,000).

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Commissioners’ Order 60-85 effective January 14. 1960, 6 DCR 197 (January 25, 1960), 16 DCRR ยง 305.1; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 30 DCR 1255, 1256 (March 18, 1983).
